game.name: Strange Seed
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 당신은 하찮은 방울덩어리지만, 어떤 DNA든지 먹으면 진화할 수 있어 가능성이 무궁무진합니다. 몸 부위를 업그레이드해 싸우고, 달리고, 날아다니며 주변 환경을 극복하세요. 포유류, 조류, 곤충, 공룡... 뭐든 될 수 있습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’re a lowly blob, but with the ability to evolve any DNA you eat, you don’t have to stay that way. Upgrade parts to fight, run, fly and overcome your environment. Mammals, birds, insects, dinosaurs... everything is on your menu!

reviewHighlights.text: As someone who enjoyed Spore and E.V.O., I really wanted to love this game. There are lots of good ideas here. You can make some ridiculous creatures,...
Feels a lot like Spore Hero. You walk around, find parts that allow you to access new areas, and make a silly little guy. I hope this gets some QoL up...
